page.title: 20Trentham - Housing Survey
page.content: This survey was conducted within the one kilometre square in which the Priory C.E.(C) Junior School is located. This is a residential area comprising some 850 owner occupied homes. There are approximately 200 detached houses, 400 semi-detached houses, 100 detached bungalows, 84 semi-detached bungalows and a few terraced houses, cottages and flats. About half of these homes have been built since 1950. A few pre-1900 cottages exist that were part of the Duke of Sutherland's estate, namely those in Park Drive, where there is some dereliction. The Dairyfields, especially Park Way is an area of large detached houses. There are no bungalows or shops on the Dairyfields. The children have quite a long walk to school and have to cross the busy main road (A 34).
